chapters.title: Prologue:  Distinctions
chapters.info: Lord Piqot Ramshalan, p. 27—Member of the Domani merchants' council. He is a buffoon; he remarked to other Domani nobles that he could manipulate the Dragon Reborn however he wished. Rand used him as bait for Graendal; she ordered Aran'gar and Delana to lay Compulsion weaves on him, and then sent him back to Rand. Ramshalan thinks he will be chosen King of Arad Doman by gaining Rand's confidence—and he is enough of a buffoon to actually believe he is succeeding.
